Trade/Device Name(s): BD MAX Extended Enteric Bacterial Panel
Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal microorganism multiplex nucleic acid-based assay
Specimen Container(s): BD MAX Extended Enteric Bacterial Panel Sample Buffer Tube
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated sample preparation and DNA extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MAX Extended Enteric Bacterial Panel, a multiplex PCR-based assay for qualitative detection of enteric bacterial pathogens using BD MAX System.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated in vitro diagnostic test for direct qualitative detection and differentiation of enteric bacterial pathogens (Plesiomonas shigelloides, Vibrio spp., ETEC LT/ST, Yersinia enterocolitica) from stool specimens of symptomatic patients with suspected acute gastroenteritis, enteritis, or colitis; used as an aid in diagnosis in conjunction with clinical, laboratory, and epidemiological information.
